name: Out Of Orbit (Game Jam Prototype)
description:
You have been knocked out of orbit and crashed landed on an unknown planet.

Connect to ancient technology in order to make your way to your lost radio.

Created by Rafi Emilio Alam and Orien Longo for the Mini Jam 63: Future (Theme: Limited Color Pallete by GrafxKid)

WASD or Arrow Keys and Space

Quit with Alt + 4 on PC 

Quit with Command + Q on Mac
